name: Rose Quartz & Amethyst Stretch Bracelet! Genuine Crystals!
description:
Rose Quartz & Amethyst Stretch Bracelet! This beaded bracelet is handmade using only natural and premium components! 

Rose Quartz is known as the “stone
of love” and is used with the Heart Chakra. Rose Quartz teaches us to bring all types of love into our life.
The gentle gemstone reminds us to love
ourselves and to open our heart to others. Rose Quartz also brings a calming and
soothing energy to help reduce stress.
Rose Quartz Zodiac Influences: Libra ~ Taurus ~ Aries

Amethyst is a master healing stone
used for psychic protection, healing and cleansing. It is also the birthstone for February! 
This Brazilian Amethyst brings a very pure
and calming energy. For these reasons, Amethyst is known as a great healer for stress and anxiety. It has also been used to encourage sobriety and help with
insomnia. 
Amethyst aids the Heart, Third Eye and Throat Chakras and has these Zodiac Influences: Virgo ~ Sagittarius ~ Capricorn ~
Aquarius ~ Pisces







This bracelet is handmade with love in the USA using only high quality components!
